author: leosimons
msg: Make the gump script work under unix again after breaking it in my last commit.

author: ips
msg: new assertion added for failure condition in XmlBeanUtils#addChildElement() - currently fails; fix added to XmlBeanUtils#copyXmlBean()

author: jsong
msg: Fix for BEEHIVE-216.  TCH will now run with inheritall="true" so that it will properly inherit filter properties.

author: leosimons
msg: Make help|run|test targets work under windows w/ cygwin. See http://wiki.apache.org/gump/ for details. Basically, we needed to edit the shell scripts to know about cygwin and the required path munging. Also, some posix features obviously aren't available, so we need those disabled on windows.
